elements.name: question1
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning

{module_name} - Post Module Survey

Thanks for learning with us!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org and our Regional Partners for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

elements.name: module_effectiveness
elements.title: Please rate your level of agreement with each of the following statements about your confidence in teaching Code.org's {module_name} unit after participating in this professional learning experience.

rows.text: After completing this module, I have a better understanding of the content relevant to teaching the {module_name} unit.
After completing this professional learning experience, I am more confident in my ability to teach Code.orgâ€™s {module_name}.
After completing this professional learning experience, I understand what my students will learn in the {module_name} unit.

elements.name: plan_to_teach
elements.title: Are you planning to teach Code.org's {module_name} unit?

choices.text: Yes, I plan to teach it this school year
Not this school year, but I plan to teach it next school year
No, I do not plan to teach this unit
I do not plan to teach the unit myself, but I do plan to train others to teach it

elements.name: supported_learning
elements.title: Which of the following supported your learning the most? Rank the options from most helpful (5) to least helpful (1). Please apply each rank (1-5) exactly once; don't give the same ranking to two different items.

rows.text: Reading a page that contained text and images about a topic.
Trying a task with step by step instructions.
Making a plan for teaching the {module_name} unit.
Completing a check for understanding question.

elements.name: how_long_to_complete
elements.title: How long did it take you to complete this professional learning experience?

elements.name: nps_self_paced_pd
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend this self-paced professional learning experience to a friend or colleague?

elements.name: how_likely_attend_inperson
elements.title: After engaging in this self-paced professional learning module, how likely are you to attend a facilitator-led professional development workshop if one were offered in your region?
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by adding visible statement as this question is no longer relevant, we can track attendance to facilitator-led pd instead of asking about interest- 05/28/2024

elements.name: other_feedback
elements.title: Do you have any feedback about this module that you would like to share with the Code.org team?

elements.name: permission_to_quote
elements.title: I give Code.org permission to quote my written comments from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me and use my name.
Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me, but I want to be anonymous.
No, I do not give the workshop organizer my permission.

elements.name: participate_focus_group
elements.title: OPTIONAL: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up discussion to provide direct feedback about this online course?

elements.name: email_focus_group
elements.title: Great! Please share an email address where we may contact you.

elements.name: thank_you
elements.html:
Thank You!

Thanks from Code.org for your time, thoughts, and passion for teaching.
